Description.Text: Unwind in the historical and ancient atmosphere of a traditional Thai village style resort, Legendha Sukhothai Resort owns an intimate and peaceful sanctuary located on the northern Thailand. A new impressive Thai village style resort, a delightful and relaxing getaway to the old town of Sukhothai, the first kingdom of Thailand. The Legendha Sukhothai Resort celebrates your stay in Sukhothai by bringing you back to the unforgettable legend of Thailand alongside fascinating atmosphere of Sukhothai village with simplicity of rural life pleasures in its own way. Hotel has a lobby, reception and it is a smoke-free hotel.

The Legendah Sukhothai Resort is painted by the backdrop of Wat Chang Lom, an ancient pagoda of elephants, located just right behind the resort. The Legendha Sukhothai Resort is set within the old town of Sukhothai surrounded by the ancient ruins and is only 900 meters away from the Sukhothai Historical Park, the ruins of Thailand first capital which was declared as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO. The resort is also closed to fresh food market, Big C supermarket and local business area.

Superior Room + ABF - Superior Room + ABF offers three single beds with air conditioning, balcony / terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms and refrigerator. Rooms are spacious, gorgeous Thai decor and fully equipped facilities, wooden floor, comfy duvet and with a courtyard view. Room Amenities : Individually controlled air-conditioning, refrigerator, Phone, armchair, dressing table, day-bed, bath-tub with integrated shower, toilet, bathroom amenities, wardrobe and non-smoking rooms. 28 sq.m.
Deluxe Room - Deluxe Room offers two single beds or triple bed with air conditioning, balcony / terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms and refrigerator. Rooms are spacious, gorgeous Thai decor and fully equipped facilities, wooden floor, comfy duvet and with a courtyard view, temple view or canal view. Room Amenities : Individually controlled air-conditioning, refrigerator, Phone, armchair, dressing table, day-bed, bath-tub with integrated shower, toilet, bathroom amenities, wardrobe and non-smoking rooms. 32 sq.m

Rooms are spacious, gorgeous Thai decor and fully equipped facilities, wooden floor, comfy duvet and with a courtyard view.
